timeline.message: DHFPROD-5627:Add 'namespaces' to mapping step when xml docs are opened

timeline.bodyText: @xnikhil08  @srinathgit  Does this support many namespaces in the source document? It looks like fetchSrcDocFromUri is parsing the value of "@xmlns"?? This really seems like something the backend should be doing. If this is just preserving QS functionality, I suppose it's fine for now. But can you create a ticket to rework this so that the backend does this properly, which include support namespaces at multiple levels of the document?
